english_example_sentence: If the students spend a lot of money, they can buy new books.
russian_example_sentence: Если студенты потратят много денег, они смогут купить новые книги.
turkish_example_sentence: Öğrenciler çok para harcasalar, yeni kitaplar alabilirler.
